dcterms:creator: Song, S.
Lichtenberg, S. P.
Xiao, J.
dcterms:description: A large-scale RGB-D dataset for scene understanding, containing 10,335 images across 19 scene categories. It includes RGB and depth data, and is used for evaluating scene classification methods.
dcterms:title: SUNRGBD Dataset

dcterms:creator: Silberman, N.
Hoiem, D.
Kohli, P.
Fergus, R.
dcterms:description: A dataset for RGB-D scene understanding, containing 1,449 images across 10 scene categories. It is used for evaluating scene classification methods.
dcterms:title: NYU Depth Dataset V2

dcterms:creator: Zhou, B.
Lapedriza, A.
Xiao, J.
Torralba, A.
Oliva, A.
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for scene recognition, containing 2.5 million images across 205 scene categories. It is used for training CNN models for scene classification.
dcterms:title: Places Dataset
